Makefile - leveldb-1.18

Table of Contents

  3. # found in the LICENSE file. See the AUTHORS file for names of contributors.

  5. #-----------------------------------------------
  6. # Uncomment exactly one of the lines labelled (A), (B), and (C) below
  7. # to switch between compilation modes.

  9. # (A) Production use (optimized mode)
  10. OPT ?= -O2 -DNDEBUG
  11. # (B) Debug mode, w/ full line-level debugging symbols
  12. # OPT ?= -g2
  13. # (C) Profiling mode: opt, but w/debugging symbols
  14. # OPT ?= -O2 -g2 -DNDEBUG
  15. #-----------------------------------------------

  17. # detect what platform we're building on
  18. $(shell CC="$(CC)" CXX="$(CXX)" TARGET_OS="$(TARGET_OS)" \
  19.     ./build_detect_platform build_config.mk ./)
  20. # this file is generated by the previous line to set build flags and sources
  21. include build_config.mk

  23. CFLAGS += -I. -I./include $(PLATFORM_CCFLAGS) $(OPT)
  24. CXXFLAGS += -I. -I./include $(PLATFORM_CXXFLAGS) $(OPT)

  26. LDFLAGS += $(PLATFORM_LDFLAGS)
  27. LIBS += $(PLATFORM_LIBS)

  29. LIBOBJECTS = $(SOURCES:.cc=.o)
  30. MEMENVOBJECTS = $(MEMENV_SOURCES:.cc=.o)

  32. TESTUTIL = ./util/testutil.o
  33. TESTHARNESS = ./util/testharness.o $(TESTUTIL)

  35. # Note: iOS should probably be using libtool, not ar.
  36. ifeq ($(PLATFORM), IOS)
  37. AR=xcrun ar
  38. endif

  40. TESTS = \
  41.         arena_test \
  42.         autocompact_test \
  43.         bloom_test \
  44.         c_test \
  45.         cache_test \
  46.         coding_test \
  47.         corruption_test \
  48.         crc32c_test \
  49.         db_test \
  50.         dbformat_test \
  51.         env_test \
  52.         filename_test \
  53.         filter_block_test \
  54.         hash_test \
  55.         issue178_test \
  56.         issue200_test \
  57.         log_test \
  58.         memenv_test \
  59.         skiplist_test \
  60.         table_test \
  61.         version_edit_test \
  62.         version_set_test \
  63.         write_batch_test

  65. PROGRAMS = db_bench leveldbutil $(TESTS)
  66. BENCHMARKS = db_bench_sqlite3 db_bench_tree_db

  68. LIBRARY = libleveldb.a
  69. MEMENVLIBRARY = libmemenv.a

  71. default: all

  73. # Should we build shared libraries?
  74. ifneq ($(PLATFORM_SHARED_EXT),)

  76. ifneq ($(PLATFORM_SHARED_VERSIONED),true)
  77. SHARED1 = libleveldb.$(PLATFORM_SHARED_EXT)
  78. SHARED2 = $(SHARED1)
  79. SHARED3 = $(SHARED1)
  80. SHARED = $(SHARED1)
  81. else
  82. # Update db.h if you change these.
  83. SHARED_MAJOR = 1
  84. SHARED_MINOR = 18
  85. SHARED1 = libleveldb.$(PLATFORM_SHARED_EXT)
  86. SHARED2 = $(SHARED1).$(SHARED_MAJOR)
  87. SHARED3 = $(SHARED1).$(SHARED_MAJOR).$(SHARED_MINOR)
  88. SHARED = $(SHARED1) $(SHARED2) $(SHARED3)
  89. $(SHARED1): $(SHARED3)
  90.         ln -fs $(SHARED3) $(SHARED1)
  91. $(SHARED2): $(SHARED3)
  92.         ln -fs $(SHARED3) $(SHARED2)
  93. endif

  95. $(SHARED3):
  96.         $(CXX) $(LDFLAGS) $(PLATFORM_SHARED_LDFLAGS)$(SHARED2) $(CXXFLAGS) $(PLATFORM_SHARED_CFLAGS) $(SOURCES) -o $(SHARED3) $(LIBS)

  98. endif  # PLATFORM_SHARED_EXT

  100. all: $(SHARED) $(LIBRARY)

  102. check: all $(PROGRAMS) $(TESTS)
  103.         for t in $(TESTS); do echo "***** Running $$t"; ./$$t || exit 1; done

  105. clean:
  106.         -rm -f $(PROGRAMS) $(BENCHMARKS) $(LIBRARY) $(SHARED) $(MEMENVLIBRARY) */*.o */*/*.o ios-x86/*/*.o ios-arm/*/*.o build_config.mk
  107.         -rm -rf ios-x86/* ios-arm/*

  109. $(LIBRARY): $(LIBOBJECTS)
  110.         rm -f $@
  111.         $(AR) -rs $@ $(LIBOBJECTS)

  113. db_bench: db/db_bench.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTUTIL)
  114.         $(CXX) $(LDFLAGS) db/db_bench.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTUTIL) -o $@ $(LIBS)

  116. db_bench_sqlite3: doc/bench/db_bench_sqlite3.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTUTIL)
  117.         $(CXX) $(LDFLAGS) doc/bench/db_bench_sqlite3.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTUTIL) -o $@ -lsqlite3 $(LIBS)

  119. db_bench_tree_db: doc/bench/db_bench_tree_db.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTUTIL)
  120.         $(CXX) $(LDFLAGS) doc/bench/db_bench_tree_db.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTUTIL) -o $@ -lkyotocabinet $(LIBS)

  122. leveldbutil: db/leveldb_main.o $(LIBOBJECTS)
  123.         $(CXX) $(LDFLAGS) db/leveldb_main.o $(LIBOBJECTS) -o $@ $(LIBS)

  125. arena_test: util/arena_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS)
  126.         $(CXX) $(LDFLAGS) util/arena_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS) -o $@ $(LIBS)

  128. autocompact_test: db/autocompact_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS)
  129.         $(CXX) $(LDFLAGS) db/autocompact_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS) -o $@ $(LIBS)

  131. bloom_test: util/bloom_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS)
  132.         $(CXX) $(LDFLAGS) util/bloom_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS) -o $@ $(LIBS)

  134. c_test: db/c_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS)
  135.         $(CXX) $(LDFLAGS) db/c_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS) -o $@ $(LIBS)

  137. cache_test: util/cache_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS)
  138.         $(CXX) $(LDFLAGS) util/cache_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS) -o $@ $(LIBS)

  140. coding_test: util/coding_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS)
  141.         $(CXX) $(LDFLAGS) util/coding_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS) -o $@ $(LIBS)

  143. corruption_test: db/corruption_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS)
  144.         $(CXX) $(LDFLAGS) db/corruption_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS) -o $@ $(LIBS)

  146. crc32c_test: util/crc32c_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS)
  147.         $(CXX) $(LDFLAGS) util/crc32c_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS) -o $@ $(LIBS)

  149. db_test: db/db_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS)
  150.         $(CXX) $(LDFLAGS) db/db_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS) -o $@ $(LIBS)

  152. dbformat_test: db/dbformat_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS)
  153.         $(CXX) $(LDFLAGS) db/dbformat_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS) -o $@ $(LIBS)

  155. env_test: util/env_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS)
  156.         $(CXX) $(LDFLAGS) util/env_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS) -o $@ $(LIBS)

  158. filename_test: db/filename_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS)
  159.         $(CXX) $(LDFLAGS) db/filename_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS) -o $@ $(LIBS)

  161. filter_block_test: table/filter_block_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS)
  162.         $(CXX) $(LDFLAGS) table/filter_block_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS) -o $@ $(LIBS)

  164. hash_test: util/hash_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS)
  165.         $(CXX) $(LDFLAGS) util/hash_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS) -o $@ $(LIBS)

  167. issue178_test: issues/issue178_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS)
  168.         $(CXX) $(LDFLAGS) issues/issue178_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS) -o $@ $(LIBS)

  170. issue200_test: issues/issue200_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS)
  171.         $(CXX) $(LDFLAGS) issues/issue200_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS) -o $@ $(LIBS)

  173. log_test: db/log_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS)
  174.         $(CXX) $(LDFLAGS) db/log_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS) -o $@ $(LIBS)

  176. table_test: table/table_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS)
  177.         $(CXX) $(LDFLAGS) table/table_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS) -o $@ $(LIBS)

  179. skiplist_test: db/skiplist_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS)
  180.         $(CXX) $(LDFLAGS) db/skiplist_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS) -o $@ $(LIBS)

  182. version_edit_test: db/version_edit_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS)
  183.         $(CXX) $(LDFLAGS) db/version_edit_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS) -o $@ $(LIBS)

  185. version_set_test: db/version_set_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS)
  186.         $(CXX) $(LDFLAGS) db/version_set_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS) -o $@ $(LIBS)

  188. write_batch_test: db/write_batch_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS)
  189.         $(CXX) $(LDFLAGS) db/write_batch_test.o $(LIBOBJECTS) $(TESTHARNESS) -o $@ $(LIBS)

  191. $(MEMENVLIBRARY) : $(MEMENVOBJECTS)
  192.         rm -f $@
  193.         $(AR) -rs $@ $(MEMENVOBJECTS)

  195. memenv_test : helpers/memenv/memenv_test.o $(MEMENVLIBRARY) $(LIBRARY) $(TESTHARNESS)
  196.         $(CXX) $(LDFLAGS) helpers/memenv/memenv_test.o $(MEMENVLIBRARY) $(LIBRARY) $(TESTHARNESS) -o $@ $(LIBS)

  198. ifeq ($(PLATFORM), IOS)
  199. # For iOS, create universal object files to be used on both the simulator and
  200. # a device.
  201. PLATFORMSROOT=/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms
  202. SIMULATORROOT=$(PLATFORMSROOT)/iPhoneSimulator.platform/Developer
  203. DEVICEROOT=$(PLATFORMSROOT)/iPhoneOS.platform/Developer
  204. IOSVERSION=$(shell defaults read $(PLATFORMSROOT)/iPhoneOS.platform/version CFBundleShortVersionString)
  205. IOSARCH=-arch armv6 -arch armv7 -arch armv7s -arch arm64

  207. .cc.o:
  208.         mkdir -p ios-x86/$(dir $@)
  209.         xcrun -sdk iphonesimulator $(CXX) $(CXXFLAGS) -isysroot $(SIMULATORROOT)/SDKs/iPhoneSimulator$(IOSVERSION).sdk -arch i686 -arch x86_64 -c $< -o ios-x86/$@
  210.         mkdir -p ios-arm/$(dir $@)
  211.         xcrun -sdk iphoneos $(CXX) $(CXXFLAGS) -isysroot $(DEVICEROOT)/SDKs/iPhoneOS$(IOSVERSION).sdk $(IOSARCH) -c $< -o ios-arm/$@
  212.         xcrun lipo ios-x86/$@ ios-arm/$@ -create -output $@

  214. .c.o:
  215.         mkdir -p ios-x86/$(dir $@)
  216.         xcrun -sdk iphonesimulator $(CC) $(CFLAGS) -isysroot $(SIMULATORROOT)/SDKs/iPhoneSimulator$(IOSVERSION).sdk -arch i686 -arch x86_64 -c $< -o ios-x86/$@
  217.         mkdir -p ios-arm/$(dir $@)
  218.         xcrun -sdk iphoneos $(CC) $(CFLAGS) -isysroot $(DEVICEROOT)/SDKs/iPhoneOS$(IOSVERSION).sdk $(IOSARCH) -c $< -o ios-arm/$@
  219.         xcrun lipo ios-x86/$@ ios-arm/$@ -create -output $@

  221. else
  222. .cc.o:
  223.         $(CXX) $(CXXFLAGS) -c $< -o $@

  225. .c.o:
  226.         $(CC) $(CFLAGS) -c $< -o $@
  227. endif
